content.detailedDescription: I went outside of my house to smoke a cigarete when i saw a plane probably a dc 7 cargo plane probably heading to our airport mirabel to the the north when i saw a blinking object from the west going east.  the weird thing is that the blinking was so intense that you would think the object was right above you execpt their was a slight cloud cover and the object going at incredible speed was above the clouds. what screwed me up is that you could still see the blinking light through the cloud as if the cloud wasent their. im ex-military so i know i thing or to about judging distances etc. i lost sighting to the east.  being above the clouds and travelling at that speed and blinking so intensly in my mind is immpossible.
content.summary: Fast blinking light at high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
Looking off my deck in the bright afternoon sun my wife and i witnessed at least 3 different objects in the sky. they stayed in a triangular pattern but then would break apart and come back together again. we watched them for roughly 20 minutes but they gradually faded off in a distance. i see planes every day and know their common path. these seemed higher up then the average plane but its hard to judge objects in the sky. 
they also would disappear and then appear in a different place. the location that i saw them in is in flowery branch, ga.I took several photographs with my camera phone but they did not show up in the picture. i also took a video of them with my phone but could not see them in the video either. these were not airplanes! i have never seen anything like it. i called the national ufo hotline to report it but they were not very helpful. i just wanted to document it in case others saw the same thing. this siting was less than a mile of a farm that has had several cow mutilations that was never solved so i felt as though this reporting may be useful


i saw this sighting on october 17 2010. i tried to put this date in my form but after i submitted it i continued to get an error. please correct this if possible
content.summary: Silver/shiny disks or circles

content.detailedDescription:
It was the mid 1970's about 7:30 pm in the fall of about 1975, and i was driving home to ashland, or, after a shopping trip in medford. i had just entered the local one-lane access/maintenance road, when i noticed a very bright blue dome sitting on the ground to my left and up ahead. i pulled half way off the road and parked.  i always thought that if i saw a ufo, i would try to get aboard.  the dome was so electric blue and bright that after i had driven up to it, i slouched behind the car door.  i thought that the dome must be generating a great deal of heat, but i got up the courage to straighten up and look at it.  there was no heat and no sound.  i was about 12 feet from the object.  my radio was on and i could hear police, highway patrolmen, truckers, and other civilians calling in about the dome.

i was afraid to try to approach the dome because it appeared to not be solid, but made up of 'electrons' only. it looked like the blue you see in an electrical arc, but it was a perfectly shaped dome. i felt at the time, that a solid object or a person could not exist inside the dome; it would just disintegrate.  the intense blue-light dome did not pulsate.  the dome appeared to be made only of electric blue light. i did not throw anything at it, because that seemed to me to be a rude and violent gesture.

the electric blue was the same opacity all over, the edge of the dome was totally defined to the eye. after about 20-30 minutes the dome gradually grew brighter(over 10 seconds, but i felt no heat and heard no sound.  at the end of that time it rose straight up and i could see the bottom.  it was perfectly flat.  i need to emphasis that the dome was a perfect half sphere.  the dome rose slowly at first, then it just took off.  i watched it as it zigzagged aroud the sky, then it went so high that i could no longer see it.

i went back the next day to look at the site.  the dome reached from about five feet from the access/maintenance road to about 30 feet from the i5 freeway.  i couldn't see any inprint, nor any flattened vegetation.  nothing was discolored.

since i had been taught scientific observation techniques, i drew the dome so i could accurately describe to scientists, military, and government officials what i had seen and what had occurred. 

there was a very short (3-4") story in the ashland newspaper about the dome the next day.  i worked for the southern oregan state college (now university) in the chemistry department as a technical typist (i typed chemical formuls, etc.). i thought since i was a trained observer and a responsible citizen, officials would look me up and interview me.  that never happened.  i told a couple of chemistry professors about it and to my surprise they weren't interested, and they knew me. i felt very let down by the scientific community.  i also felt that our scientists are not inquisitive, but they should be.  i was astounded that neither the military nor the federal government interviewed me.  it feels good to set this down on 'paper'.  maybe you can find the newspaper article, the policemen, the highway patrolmen, and the truckers (all on i5) and interview them.  if i can answer any addition questions, please contact me. i chose the anonymous option above because i don't want to be contacted by a bunch of kooks.  if you have someone who wants to talk with me and you respect him, feel free to give him my name, e-mail address, or phone number.

once again, thank you for providing a forum where i could post my experience in detail.  i was afraid that i would die and no one would know that ufo's really exist, because of a lack of credible witnesses.  please excuse the spelling mistakes, no spellcheck. :)

when i try to submit this document, i receive a message that says: the event date cannot be earlier than the current date, so i changed the event date to 2011.
content.summary: I observed an electric blue colored dome on the ground 12' from me.

content.detailedDescription:
My mom brought these photos home about a month ago from vacation this summer from spending time with family... i saw this phot once after she got home from getting them developed, i immidiayely said whoa! she didnt notice anything or whatevr when this picture was taken... and i know 35mm photography, used to shoot develop and make my own prints....I do believe this really is apart of the image!!! 

what it is i have no clue..... but for all i know and can logically reason this shoun't be there...... there arent even planes in the air out there in the countr where this was taken; fyi...........


please inform me if i can be of any other assitance.... she has the photo, negitives and the digital image i have attached below.

thank you

                                      sincelry

                                        (name removed) cms 09/02/11 08:39 flg
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Oval,   Square,   Rectagular,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Not visually seen by my mom....  i saw photos and saw what she didnt

content.detailedDescription:
my friend and i were on our way back to nc from fl,with me as the passenger.(our third such trip in as many months.)

 we were both so tired of the long distance drive that the radio had been turned off hours previously.So it was dead quiet,except for the hum of the little honda we were in..(just ready to get to our destination if you know what i mean.)

 we were approaching the only real clearing and straight road that 38 has to offer.When "it" shot down from above and hovered over the road for a moment.(at least a mile ahead of us,at the other end of the clearing.)

 it then shot toward us at an unreal speed,but just before it hit the windshield it shot upwards(,and yes we both flinched from it.).

 i immediately looked behind us,and then hung my head out the window to look upwards..But i saw nothing more.

 both of us just sat there completely stunned by what we just saw..All that was said between us was.."did you see that?".."yep"..,and there were no other words exchanged between us about it until the following day.

 it was slightly larger than a basketball and it's coloring seemed to be both white and yellow,but there was no discerning whether there were multiple lights or if it was just changing rapidly..Who knows,but it was fast!
content.summary: Fireball in south carolina that seemed to follow the road for a moment.

content.detailedDescription:
First thing is first i would like to apologize for the date being wrong on the "date of event" area. it was not approximately january 1st 2011. the website kept giving me an error saying that the date i put in was "later than the current date," even though i listed it clearly as "approximately october 15th 2010."


    sometime in the middle of october 2010, i was up late playing computer games in my bedroom on the second story of my home here in harleysville pennsylvania. i was getting tired around 12:30am and decided to go to sleep around 1:00am. i fell asleep quite quickly in nothing but my boxers. before i go into detail about the encounter i experienced, allow me to explain the layout of my room relative to the map i submitted.
    my bedroom is on the second story on the southwest end of my home. i have 3 windows in my room on the front face of the house and have access to both the attic and the only fire escape on the building. this house used to be an old office building in which my bedroom was one of the offices used. my actual bed is located in the southwest corner next to a window and directly next to the fire escape door. this door has no handle on the outside and only a bar-release on the inside similar to what you would find on the inside of a school entrance door or office building. the door also has a 1.3x1.3 foot window in the top center. the actual fire escape on the outside of the door is nothing more than a metal platform and railing leading down the side of my house with metal stairs. i often use this to have a cigarette when i am at home since smoking inside the house is forbidden by the landlord. this goes to say i am quite familiar with what the scenery on the outside of my home looks like in this location.
    i awoke on this day around 3am based on the dark of night outside, however, when i awoke i was already outside on my fire escape platform. i had not been dreaming as far as i could tell since everything was as it was when i am awake, and have had many vivid almost lucid dreams in the past, and i can tell you this was not that sensation. i was very groggy and confused as to how i had walked in my sleep. i have not sleepwalked since i was about 8 years old, and at this time i was 19 almost 20. i almost immediately noticed something very very large above me after this initial confusion, and took quick notice to my door being closed behind me leaving no way of re-entering my home.
    as soon as i noticed this however, i felt the urge to look at this large object hovering above me. as i looked up i noticed it was sort of rounded in shape but had many many lights on the underside of it. it was directly above me so i had no view of the sides of the object. the lights were a very very bright white. nothing like any fluorescent bulb i have ever seen. these lights were flashing without any pattern it seemed and were located all over the underside of the object in rectangular and very long trapezoidal shapes. the object had to have been at least 250 feet in diameter, possibly larger.
    the underside of the object also had many things jutting out from it with these lights on it as well, but i took a firm notice to one in particular. there was this large piece with the lights on the side of it coming out from the right of the object. it's shape was like an upside down cone with the end cut off. it resembled an air filter for a high performance engine in a car. it had symmetrical lights all around its sides that were identical to the ones on the underside of the object, however the bottom of this piece jutting out was a very very dark gray-black color.
    when i had first looked up, the lights were so blinding that i had to shield my eyes with one hand to see they were flashing and their shapes and locations. i observed all of this within less than 90 seconds before i became very disoriented. i forgot what i was doing, where i was at, and who i was. almost as if these lights were inducing an acute case of amnesia. the last thing i can remember before passing out was the strange sensation of floating. i had never experienced this before, but it was as if i were suddenly weightless. my feet were no longer touching the cold metal platform and i was no longer shielding my eyes. as soon as i was blinded by the lights that were flashing i seemed to lose consciousness, unless the lights caused me to forget everything leaving me no memory of anything afterwards.
    throughout these short minutes the object made absolutely no sound. it was as if it was making everything around it completely quiet. if you have ever heard the saying "silence is deafening," i would have to agree, there were no sounds made after i noticed the object above me. this was extremely strange since my home is on a main road, and relatively close to the pennsylvania turnpike. hearing not even the sound of a cricket chirp or the hum of the highway was definitely weird. i also remember the silence being almost suffocating. it felt very heavy, as if it were making the air thick like soup.
    in my short, and very close observation, i remember the object being about 20 to 40 feet above me and the space in between my house and the neighbors house, and the tree in between the front of our homes was blocking out a portion of this large object. there was no wind, as if time had stopped in its tracks. this is all simply speculation, but it was what it seemed to me.
    after i lost consciousness, it got extremely bizarre. i remember waking up without any senses except for my sight and sense of balance. i was laying down with my eyes looking upwards towards what seemed to be a ceiling. my eyes were not working correctly though. it was as if i had been administered eye drops that you would get at the doctors to dilate your pupils. everything was very blurry and distorted. i remember very little, but i do remember everything was a green/brown/gray color around me. i also remember seeing strange objects above me that appeared to be tools or examination equipment above me, none of which seemed to be created by humans. it was very very blurry though so it was hard to tell if that was exactly what it was.
    i then remember a figure move into view above me. i was unable to move at all, and my vision was very poor so i could discern nothing about this being other than it seemed a little taller than i am and it had appendages like a human being (arms, torso, head, legs, etc.). it did not speak to me, however, i seemed to hear a voice in my head. it was much less a voice than it was a feeling or emotion being conveyed. the very last thing i can remember was feeling very calm, as if this being was trying to help me in some sort of way. the "trying to help you" feeling i received was much less about me in particular, but more of a "you" as in "your race." i then saw one of the objects above me move slightly, and i lost consciousness again.
    when i came to i was sitting on the edge of my bed. my bed was made very neatly as if i had never layed down at all that night. when i looked at my alarm clock, the time was about 4:45am. i tried to remember how i got there, but nothing came to mind. i tried to sleep, but my thoughts were buzzing faster than i could even keep up with. i could not sleep no matter how hard i tried that night. the only thing i kept asking myself was "why wasn't i scared or afraid throughout this entire experience?"


    i am not trying to garner attention in any way shape or form with this.. this is why i am choosing to remain anonymous. i just hope that maybe this can help somebody understand things a little better, even if i can not understand any of this myself.
    i always thought the ufo phenomenon was a bunch of crap before this experience. since this experience i have been haunted, and have wanted to tell somebody but have always been too afraid of being called a crackpot. the only person i have ever told this story to is my best friend, and he is probably the only person who will ever know who i am and what i witnessed. i have witnessed a few other strange occurrences that happened after this account i have just given you, but they are far less important i think.

i hope this will help in some way shape or form.
content.summary: Ufo above my home, possible abduction.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm in bliss, idaho.  went down to the store around 12:30 a.M. (09/02/2011), and that was my first look at this 'star'. not a cloud in the sky tonight, and there are a million stars out.  this thing isn't a star.  it's way too big, and it appears to be way too close.  

anyway, went into the store and told the gals who work there about it, and they went outside to get a look.  they all agreed it's way too big to be a star, and it has a shape to it.  

with the naked eye, the shape kind of looks like it's a 'soft' triangle.  by that i mean there are no sharp edges.  it kind of curves back a bit.  no blinking lights on it.  just white star-like color.  it looks lower than normal stars.  it's situated off toward the east, maybe south-east.  pretty much the same direction the guy from mountain home, id mentioned.  and, with the naked eye, it even looks like what he saw.  only difference is, this one's not moving.  

as a matter of fact, it hasn't moved at all since i first saw it.  not one inch.  you know how, if you keep looking at one star in the sky, after a while as the earth rotates, the star appears to move.  not this thing. it's still in the same place, and it's been in the same place for just about 2 hours now.

what i just described is what it looks like with the naked eye. take a look at the photos i've linked to, and you'll see it actually looks nothing like i just described.

here's a link to the flikr account where the pictures i took tonight are stored. i haven't done anything to them.  i tried to crop them, and zoom in closer, but i couldn't figure out how to do it, so i just left them alone.   

(link removed to fi field) cms 09/02/11 09:16 cst flg

click on the photos and zoom in.   i think, at that point, it becomes pretty darned clear this isn't your normal every day star.   

p.S. it's now 2:35 a.M.  it's still there.  just hanging there.  frankly, i'm starting to kind of hope this is just a normal star.  it's kind of giving me the creeps now.
content.summary: Bliss, idaho - great big, weird-looking 'star' in the sky.  it doesn't move.

content.detailedDescription:
It is only one of several sightings over the years many of which occured shortly after 9/11, and more over the last 5 years. i truly believe there is a new area 51 like place in nc in or near rutherford county. i as well as my sister and brother n law and mom have all seen a solid white ball of light fly silently across the sky at dusk and at night. it is not a plane as there are no flashing lights. the entire object has a brilliant white glow to it. 
i have also seen 3 yellow light objects in the sky that were sitting perfectly still in the northwest sky, and fly off and disapper in seconds. i have seen (in the day time) an object which looks like a basketball flying around an airplane in the town of rutherfordton. 
i am willing to submit to any lie detector, hypnosis or any other test. 
if you came here, you would not have to stay longer than a month or maybe not that long before you would see something yourself.
content.summary: Solid white ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen 3 different ufo's all about 40 years ago
but i remember them like yesterday
fist one almost everyday occournce at lake serene north of lynnwood wa.
best one i watched for 10 minutes or so on top on roof of gulf gas station
it was tilted about 20 deg. there were about 5 people like about 3-4 ft. tall 2 white may6be boss's 3 blue's workers they were on the deck working on it i guess i was on my way for a date or something that was 40 years ago. it was still there when i left. the last one was across the street
from the gulf gas station going abouve mc alesters motor cycle shop i think that was the name of the place. just went over the cycle shop
was wood's i was driveing at the time after work going to a friends place or something. about 2 years later . the lake serene one was a almost everyday ocrence you could see them i used to have a picture but its long gone now. it had fire comming out from the bottom center cant remember what color it was
in all 3 times i was driveing all 3 times i parked & watched
the first one lot's of people saw them most everyday at night or dusk
second one on gulf gas station after work i worked for seattle school dist.1 as a custodian i was about 20 years old
it was kind of strange why it was at 20 deg. angle on gulf roof & people on deck of ship there was no feeling of time i dont know how long i watched it i left because i felt like i had to go.
content.summary: Disk was ontop of roof  of  gulf gas station at 20 deg.Angle hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was with 5 people in a car coming back from fishing. we were out in the counrty near newman when all of a sudden i see a light falling from the sky. it looked like it was about to crash it was very low to the ground and made movements that a conventional aircraft is not able to do. the it came closer into few and we saw randomly blinking lights but you could tell it was a triangular shape. it the did flips and quickly hovered over a house and flashed down a bright beam of light. the lights came from 5 high powered lights on the bottom of the craft, i am a stargazer and i looked at the midnight sky all the time and i have never seen anything this close up. then the object turned the lights off and quickly flew in the northern direction out of sight.
content.summary: Triangular shaped craft. 5 bright lights on the bottom. (newman,ca area)

content.detailedDescription: Object appeared suddenly out of nowhere and went on downward angled directional path and disappeared behing a tall building. this occurred at a high rate of speed. the object appeared to be some sort of missile-like aircraft but did not resemble a typical aircraft in that it was solid light with no visible wing structure. it was a wide band of light with a slight light trail behind it.
content.summary: Streaked across the sky at low altitude and high speed.

content.detailedDescription: It was 9pm at my friends house in lititz, pa.  we were standing in her front yard talking.  i noticed that the moon was rather close to the horizon and looked very bright orange.  i told my friend to check it out then realized the moon was to my left so the large "fireball" was not the moon.  it was the same size as about a quarter of the moon would appear.  it changed in shape and hovered and moved in the same general location.  then it got much smaller so that it appeared slightly bigger and brighter than the brightest star.  my friend took two pictures.  it changed color from orange/red to white.  it began to move in somewhat of a circle then flew away from us.  it disappeared within a second or two.  it was exciting to see it because i've never seen anything strange in the sky before and because it was so large and unique, i am confident that i am not mistaking it for a plane, meteor, or anything else i am familiar with.  later, two other people i know told me they saw it at different locations in the same county.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Egg,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Bright red-orange fireball above horizon changed in shape, size, and color.

content.detailedDescription:
Called in to sd via cell phone.
10:07pm to 11:05pm
august 31, 2011
versailles, mo.
witness saw 2 large craft and 6-8 smaller craft interacting with the larger craft. at first he thought they were airplanes, but got his binoculars and saw the disc structure and the smaller surrounding craft.
the craft were located near the end of the big dipper hovering.  the large craft had flashing red lights and several shades of green lights that were darker and brighter. 
emf-no
animal reaction: no
sound: no; too high
all the craft seemed to be at commercial airline altitude (30,000 ft ?).
the 2 larger craft hovered while the smaller craft zipped around in the same area. the larger craft were a little smaller than jupiter appears, and the smaller were star size.  the smaller craft were flying a broken (z) pattern formation.
i was on the phone with the witness through most of the sighting but about 200 miles away looking in the same part of the sky as we spoke. since i could see nothing described, the action would have to be localized.
debbie z sd
content.summary: Disc shaped craft seen near end of big dipper with 6-8 smaller silver craft interacting.

content.detailedDescription: Around 5pm to 6pm on 8/27/2011, i was going to store with 3 other people in the car, i was driving up a hill, when i spotted a black thing in the sky, told the others in the car, as we tried to figure out what it was.  thought it was a hang glider, the other person in the car thought it was a kit, then said it was a motorized airplane. our windows where down, as it got closer you could not here any noise coming from the aircraft and you could see that it was not what we thought. it was flying very low towards us and took a turn towards the mountains it was all black and the shape was a triangle. i know others seen this, since i could see the driver  in front of me pointing at it. upset that i could not find my phone in time to get a picture. (just trying to figure out what this was?)did not see or hear anything in the news. i do know that since we live in the area, that our cable, phone and internet was out for several hours.
content.summary: Flying aircraft seen in daytime on 8/27/2011around 5pm, in westminster colorado

content.detailedDescription: last night(08/31/2011), here in battle creek, mi. about 9:20 pm (not really sure about the exact time) i was talking with a friend in front of his house, when suddenly a big (far bigger than an airplane) white light, on the sky got my attention. i asked him to watch the sky, he agreed with me 100% that wasn't  a plane or chopter, no flashing lights or colors, solid glowing white light, flying from north to sw (think so), i'm not sure about the altitude, but i would say about 3000 feet, speed? faster than a comercial flight (relative, depending on real distance), maybe 1.5 times faster. i try to take a picture but was hard to find it and focus it. then, before getting lost over the horizon (line of houses across a parking lot) it dimmed slowly, till dissapeared. there was no engine or electrical noise, nothing. the whole thing took about 25-35 seconds. it was awsome!!
content.summary: Very bright white light crossing the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Report called in to sd and filed by sd.
sighting occurred while family was returning from school event.
present: husband/wife/12 yr old daughter/14 yr old female friend.
the family was returning from high point elementary school and took a wrong turn.  they asked for directions and were going home from cheyanne rd down hwy cc.  the daughter was the first to notice the 3 red lights in the distant field (75-100 yrds away)which were parallel and rising. the wife was driving and pulled over so they could have a better view. they rolled down the car windows and watched the lights rise to a height of a telephone pole, form a triangle, rise again, spin and form a diamond shape, rise higher (helicopter altitude) form a straight up and down  line, flash, then rise very fast straight up and disappear. 
the area was very dark where the sighting occurred.  there were no houses, lights, or passing cars, just fields, hills and trees.
duration of sighting: 10 min.
time: 9:30pm
location: near cheyanne rd/hwy cc
no sound (errie)
no emf effect
no physical side effects
no missing time
no animal reaction
weather: clear/hot
total number od witnesses: 4
content.summary: Row of red lights rising from field at night with changing alignment.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my ex where driving down highway 18, we had just passed the new ethinole plant that just got up and running like a week or so before.
i was just driving down the road when all of a sudden six lights appeared above my car at first i thought it was just big street lights it felt like i was in side a football stadium. and then i asked my ex if she was seeing the lights and she said yes. keep in mind i was going 55 mph when i first noticed it. i then started asking how can this still be in front of me its like it was staying at my speed, 3 min or so had gone by  and the lights where still in the same spot in the sky obove my car  where i frst noticed them so i decided to slow down to get a better look when i did, it seemed to move then but only because i backed of my speed down to 35. now the craft was a little lower in my view and i had to clime over to the passanger seat to  see the other side and i also had to lower my body in my seat to see the left side the thing was massive. it was longer than the distance it was away from me. back to what happend after i slowed down. i stayed at about 35 for 5 min or so when all of a sudden the lights started to do things. the fisrt light turned off then the fourth light turned off then the second light turned off then the fith light turned off then the third light turned off then the sixth light turned off. and at that point i thought it was over and then like 30 sec later all the lights turned on in the some pattern. at that point i was speachless. then it like someone had a light dimer and the lights dimed out this time it took about 3 to 4 second for the lights to lose all power but it kept the same pattern as before. 1 4 2 5 3 6 then as soon as i could i pulled of on a side road and got out and look all over the sky and i noticed that there where 10 plus lights in the sky moving in all directions and no real flight path they where flying in triangle shape squars and just all over the sky and we watche these for about 10 min before we decided to go we where on a scedual and we had wasted enough time and we left.
content.summary: Very larg flying object, going about fiftyfive miles and hour  then down to 35and less slowed when i slowed down

content.detailedDescription:
This is something,tho imprinted in my mind, that is very hard to explain in words. i was walking in the side yard if my grandmothers home in downtown lawrenceville when i had the feeling to look up. the sky was a beautiful blue,sort of bluebird color. something caught my eye to my left,it was very high up. i thought it was a bird as it looked as if it was flapping it's wings but i soon realized this was something slowing down and coming out of beening seen and turning colors. then the object stopped and i could see the outline and almost dull aluminum like exterior no more colors. this object was approximately 10,000 ft straight up from my viewpoint. it was extremely large and sorta egg shaped. then another one just like the other came up next to it. i can still see the outline of both against that sky. i looked around to see if anyone else was watching but as i was in the yard and most folks were in cars or walking around the side walks no one else looked in that direction. i looked back up to see what i had already thought of as ufos. i have no idea how long i watched them hover at that altitude as time seemed to stop. then the ufo which had come up next to the first moved forward just passed the other and then turned on it's own axis and took off at a very high rate of speed. the other ufo started to turn different colors while not moving and then took off at a very,very high rate if speed then disappeared after several seconds. then all town sound came back and i looked around again for any sign of witnesses. no 
one that i know of was around. i served in army 
aviation during the 60's and i have seen every type of
 aviation aircraft,including the spy planes,nothing,and i mean nothing, comes close to what i saw that afternoon. no aircraft i know of can turn around or move that fast on this earth. i have learned to live with this knowledge knowing there are some other beings who are much more advanced then we will be,if ever. i have only discussed this with very close friends who understand what i am talking about. a few
others have seen ufos also but one would be hard pressed to get them to come forward. i hope this will help but nothing beats talking about it face to face because there is a few things not very explainable here .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Inside town noise stopped and it was as if time stood still. i still have no idea why i looked up that day. it was like they wanted me to do so.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the street to the gas station and saw 3 red ufos it was very far away but the rised towards the sky and then dissappeared. as i got home i stood near the pool area of my apartments to smoke a cidgarette when i saw 3starlike stars rise but the stayed in a triangle shapei notice somewhat of an outline of them it turned out to be a  boomerang shapped object i then seen small what looked like stars going back and forth from one end of the object (a small light would go to one end of the boomerang stay for about 30 seconds thenhover away then just went so fast and dissapeared) i noticed to re blue pulsating object below the boomerang moving around the object as if it were protecting it. about a mile away from the boomerang there was a very very bright star i had thought it was a planet but then it proceeded to move  to north of nevada i observed these objects till about 2am. i went inside i ate and came out to see if they were still there but they werent at his time it was about 330 am i stared at the sky about 4am a fast white glowing object zig zagged then dissappeared. that was the last that i saw then went to school.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw 3 red ufos rise up and a boomerang shaped ufo with many small ufos going to it

content.detailedDescription: My grandma sister and i were reterning from dropping a fammily frend at her home when my sister and i noticed lights over burnsville that were cumming from severel aircraft that i was not fummilyear with, at the time as is still the case i injoy looking at aircraft as thay fly over head, in books, on tv and on the internet and thees were nuthing i had ever seen. thay were just sitting ther in the sky motionlis with a beem of wight light cumming from ther underside with what at the time seemed were red lights at ether end. my sister and i lost sight of them when we rowned the corner.  latter as we were closer to home i spotted a nuther one over the trees high in the sky it was a tryangyaler aircraft with a red light neer each corner and a white light beem cumming from the senter of the aircraft and going down behind the treeline. about a year after i asked my sister about it she didint remember it wich made me just keep this to myself for the past ten years but i just fell i need to let summbudy know.
content.summary: I saw sumpthing i cant explain and i cant keep it to my self any more

content.detailedDescription:
i was a military brat. my father was a pilot in vietnam and later he flew as a commercial pilot for a number of years. 
     it was about 930pm and my fiance was outback of our duplex and said "hey come here, quick". so i joined her outside. she then pointed out an unknown object and said " is that a plane?".The ufo was a starlike craft. we didnt see any red flashing lights, and as it flew by it was silent. the object was a white starlike object traveling horizontally from approximately nw to se. about halfway through our observed flightpath we witnessed what we thought was a "shooting star" intersect with the object. then my wife said "its gonna disapear", i literaly had my hand over my mouth and it got dimmer and it dissaper.  
     
     from the time me and my f'iance saw this starlike object till it dissapeaed i would guess the distance to be anywere from 25-55 miles , the wasnt an asteroid, meteorite, plane,helicopter,drone, it was unlike any manmade objects i have eer seen. there were not any tall buildings, there was not any cloud cover. and i had a good vantage point to observe. i figured the odds off a meteorite colliding with a plane or any flying objects are slm to none. i am not a professional astronamer, or of any ther sort to certify all distances are of he best of my abilty. i have never withnessed any thing like this in my life before. and i was actually a little worried for some reason.
content.summary: Bright white starlike object with straight path observe a shootingstar

content.detailedDescription: Me and my dad and my friend were sitting out side when i seen a what at first thought was a star.After watching for about ten seconds i told my dad and my friend to look and seen the object suddenly move to the right .Once it was moving to the right it seemed to start moving faster after it was about three quarters of the way across the sky it turned red and then disappeared.
content.summary: Light moved across the sky

content.detailedDescription: A couple of years ago my daughter and i were at the local lake not far from our house here in pennsylvania.It was a cloudy day not sunny grey day.First what got my attention was this big eagle flying up in the air.But then i noticed another thing yes a ufo it was grey just hovering like a saucer.I am thinking is this real.My daughter was quiet young at that time she did not see it.But i did .I will never forget that day.I never tell anyone about it.Then they gave me a message one morning.I was half asleep but my eyes started to open on my bed headboard was the holographic message.Which i do not know what it means.Tow plantes with rings around them and a comet in the middle.I am thinking someone is playing tricks on me.But it was early morning and the blinds to my room were down and closed how could this be.It was a message either where they come from or some kind of an anlignment maybe in the future.Both planets had rings around them and what appeared to be a comet.I kept it quiet all this time never telling anyone in fear people would think i am crazy.After that my daughter and i have unusual electrical experiences..Now just the other night while i was asleep i saw a grey just his face staring at me with big black watery eyes.I did not feel threatened though.I live in the woods .I do have neighbors around but would never ask them if they have experienced anything weird at all.I did not right down the date i should of when i saw that.I did not think about it.I do not take drugs or drink.
content.summary: Over lake ufo hovering

content.detailedDescription:
We were traveling up at midnight 2 decades ago.  these 3 blimp - type gondolas things (did not see the blimps, just the gondolas)  they were 25 ft. off the ground, about 25 ft. flying at 25 mph. (so, you could see that it wasn't an aircraft, do not go that slow! they flew in an arc first parallel to us (me, a girlfriend, and daughter but i have not got in contact with in decades.  we both had college educations.) then turned of about 30 degrees.  could it have 3 blimps flying that late and that close together?  i think goodyear have 3 total!  yes, wright pat was 20 miles away, could be a test?  they rolled down the windows (they were on the passenger side) and we here nothing!  i got work the the next, told my story, was ridiculed, and that was the end of me telling my story!  
no need to get in contact with me, i just want to if blimps traveled at night!  bugged me for decades!

(name removed from report) cms 09/02/11 02:04 cst flg

below you wanted a sketch.  it was sort of like a lighted gondola.
content.summary: 3 bimp type airships at midnight

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the deck with my mother and my dog.  the object appeared over the ne treeline and seemed to be about the size of an airliner. it's glow was very bright and seemed about the altitude of an airliner.  we watched it as it flew overhead and then a secondary brilliant orb flashed in front of it's trajectory and disappeared only for the first object to intersect where the second one had been.  an airliner was flying from the north to the south and it intersected the path of the object after it had passed by about 1 minute. it was too low for a satellite and was at least the size and brightness of a high beam headlight on a dark road. it finally disappeared over the far hills having never deviated from its path nor grew brighter or fainter.
content.summary: Bright object appeared with a secondary one crossing it's path

content.detailedDescription:
Commuting from work from redwood city to boulder creek. on skyline bld of top of ridge that devides the bay area from the pacific ocean. at points on the road can see both sides clearly. on side is palo alto and the other is pescadaro beach and ocean waves clearly. small amber sphere came out of the ocean at pescadero so we stoped aside on skyline (1200 feet above sea level) and observed.  it must of seen our car lights and proceeded toward us (no commuters at that time period. got larger and larger as came straight toward us then stoped in front of us with no sound.  i jumped out of our '72 toyota landcruiser with spotlight on top of roof. jumped up and down waving my arms then sent "sos" signal with the spot light directly toward this incredably large amber ball of light.  each time i did this it would repond up and down, side to side, and diagonally and returned to its original position each time (no sound)  after 20 min or so it took off straight up leaving a com trail within a less than a second out of sight (no sound).
question:  what is in the pacific ocean in the monterey gorge?

saw same similar object later and looking as if it was in trouble, then another time leaving com trail grids (about 10 mile squares) in the entire bay area below a 1000 feet

one person said it was too old of an incident.  san jose mercury (betty barnical) reporter reported same similar object was sighted at the same time in pheonix, arizon.  i had her describe the object to me and never revealed my story.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Huge amber ball of light that came from pescadaro beach ocean to us

content.detailedDescription: I was leaning out of the window in my room at night smoking a cigarette. as i was smoking, looking out at the sky and the stars, four bright white lights came into sight. they were disc like shapes, they looked like stars but bigger. each one would come in different directions. one moved towards the west, one towards the east, one towards the south, and one towards the north. it looked like they were going around the world, and then they all came back together above me but to my left kinda. they did this pattern for about 3 min, and it was doing it pretty fast as well. i had no idea what it could be because nothing could project a light that could wrap around like that it was a very confusing situation.  i knew it was something not human because no plane, jet etc. can do what it was doing. i called my neighbor because she was over at my house earlier and still up. she went outside and didn't know what it was either, but just kind of "swept it under the rug". these strange objects stopped after a while but the whole time i was watching them very intently.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Disc like shapes, looked like big stars, moved from west, east, south, north.

content.detailedDescription: They looked like stars playing with each other. they would fly in and out of the clouds. they would fly and hit each other and the lights would split in a few seconeds they would get back together. they then started to play again. about a half hour went by then out of the clouds a big triangle came out then a miniut later a bigger dimoned shapped one came out of another cloud with a center red green blue strobbing light. the truck we were driving stopped running for some resone. would not re start.About ten miniuts later they all flew back into the clouds. two mins later two fighter jets were flying back and forth around the area we saw the lights. this went on for ten fifteen mins or so. about four hours later the truck started back up and we drove off.  this seems to be an area where of people are always seeing these lights but no one ever says a thing about it. i belive they dont want to be seen as wierd people or crazy..     paul
content.summary: Like they were playing with each other.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning home from school headed north on peroia street and turned west onto mississippi avenue. as i headed west i spotted a small cloud that seemed to be glowing in the top left corner. the glow was a yellow almost like that of a wooden pencil. my dad also saw the cloud and said that it seemed to get dimmer. i didn't get a chance to see if it moved or not but it didn't move while i was watching it.
content.summary: Seemed to be inside a small cloud and radiated yellow light. then the light seemed to dim
7 lights hover low. turn on its side  merge disapear
